web_snippets: All this to say, I love Linda Dillow ... Beyond her writing, she is a missionary and has traveled the globe as a Christian women's speaker.
Linda Dillow is the cofounder of Authentic Intimacy (with Dr. Juli Slattery), author of the bestselling Calm My Anxious Heart, and coauthor of Intimate Issues.
Linda Dillow is the author of numerous books, including The Big Book of Family Fun, Creative Counterpart, and Priority Planner and co-author of the popular.
